long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick and easy canvas extension for assignments with long rubrics so that you can simply click and toggle whether or not you've completed that section. Your checked off sections will stay toggled even if you close or refresh the page.


Future enhancements:
- Adding notes
- Customized color
- Ability to toggle 

Contact me about any other extensions you would like to see!
